column4: Hello all, Is there a way to be able to read/write on the windowspartion of my dual boot computer? WinXp and 5.10 ubuntu
is the windows FS formatted as NTFS ?
you can try using a program called captive-ntfs, which uses the windows native ntfs drivers to allow full safe write.
but dont come calling when it breaks your system
check the /msg that ubotu sent ya
